com.koalog.util.html
Interface HTML

public interface HTML

HTML related constants.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String[] LATIN1_ENTITIES
          HTML entities for Latin-1 (ISO-8859-1) character set, they are grouped by sets of 3 references: character entity reference, decimal character reference and hexadecimal character reference.
 

Field Detail

LATIN1_ENTITIES

public static final java.lang.String[] LATIN1_ENTITIES
HTML entities for Latin-1 (ISO-8859-1) character set, they are grouped by sets of 3 references: character entity reference, decimal character reference and hexadecimal character reference.
